ai_summary_tooltip: When enabled, the large model will automatically summarize documents when searching the knowledge base and provide summarized results
default_prompt_tip: Intelligently summarize the submitted content, do not improvise
temperature_tooltip: Lower temperature makes answers more rigorous. Higher temperature makes answers more divergent.
max_token_tooltip: Maximum token count for question+answer. If answers are truncated, increase this value
hybrid_retrieval_desc: Execute all three retrieval modes simultaneously, use RRF algorithm for ranking, and select results that better match user questions from the three query results. Hybrid retrieval balances semantic similarity and logical correlation, improving retrieval accuracy and credibility of generated results through complementary advantages
vector_retrieval_desc: Convert user questions into vectors and match similarity with knowledge base segments, returning results with high similarity. Vector retrieval excels at semantic similarity matching and large-scale unstructured data processing, but lacks interpretability and precise relationship verification
graph_retrieval_desc: Retrieve knowledge related to user questions through relationship reasoning. Knowledge graph retrieval excels at precise entity relationship reasoning and logical verification, but provides weaker support for unstructured text and semantic fuzzy queries
full_text_retrieval_desc: Match vocabulary in documents through word segmentation and return text fragments containing these words
top_k_tooltip: Maximum number of segments to recall from the knowledge base, minimum 1, maximum 10. More recalled segments consume more tokens.
similarity_threshold_tooltip: During recall, only text segments with similarity greater than the threshold will be recalled. Value range: 0~1, higher threshold makes answers more accurate, recommended not to exceed 0.9
rerank_model_tooltip: During recall, only text segments with similarity greater than the threshold will be recalled. Value range: 0~1, higher threshold makes answers more accurate, recommended not to exceed 0.9
